metadata.title: CVE-2024-53976 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - low
metadata.description: Under certain circumstances, navigating to a webpage would result in theaddress missing from the location URL bar, making it unclear what the URLwas for the loaded webpage. This vulnerability affects Firefox for iOS <133.

criterions.comment: mozjs102: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs115: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
